item.description:
I'm assuming the format is the same as the final contest from May 2010, which I also posted as a meetup event. I will make corrections if I find out anything has changed.

This is the finals for the karaoke contest that I had posted on Tues. nights in Jan. I will be one of the competitors in the finals. The winner of this evening's competition will get a free trip to California (I think) to compete in a national contest there.  

The contest starts at 5 PM, although the contestants need to arrive by 4. I don't know how easy it will be to save seats for people if they show up after 5 PM.

Please let me know what time you plan to arrive.

There will be 2 rounds, with each contestant getting to sing a song in each of the 2 rounds. The order of contestants will be random, but will be completely determined before the contest starts. I was told they will produce a schedule that will show approximately when each contestant will sing. You can come and go during the evening. I don't know the exact number of contestants, but I think it will be around 30, so this will take a long time. There will be 3 judges.

note: Rockingham Rd. is Route 28. From Rt. 93, exit 3, take Rt. 111 eastward. At the intersection with rt. 28, make a right onto rt. 28. Jonathan's is on the left, not far down I'm posting this event to several meetup groups. 

Look for the lounge inside the bowling alley.

Last year there was time for regular karaoke after the contest finished.
item.why: I'd appreciate the support, since I'll be competing. Last year this event was very entertaining. The contestants were excellent!
item.name: karaoke contest finals
